General.Name: Zhuzhou Feilu High-Tech Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuzhou Feilu High-Tech Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of anti-corrosion and protective materials for metal surfaces, non-metal surfaces, and concrete surfaces in China. The company offers anti-corrosion coatings, such as polyurethane paints, fluorocarbon topcoats, acrylic paints, epoxy paints, alkyd paints, etc.; waterproof protective materials, including water-based pre-coating primers, water-based epoxy anti-rust primers, water-based acrylic paints, water-based polyurethane topcoats, water-based damping paint, and other products; floor coatings and functional polymer materials; and supporting coating construction services. It is also involved in the manufacture and construction of steel structures, such as rail transit equipment, and railway station buildings and bridges; track construction projects; civil buildings and municipal engineering; wind power, photovoltaic and energy storage equipment, etc. Zhuzhou Feilu High-Tech Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Zhuzhou, China.

6.Name: Mr. Zi Li  Cai
6.Title: VP - Mktg & Gen. Mang. of Tarck Equipment Anti Corrosion Department
